import { AppBar, Toolbar, Typography, CssBaseline, Box, Container, Paper, Grid, TextField, Button, } from '@material-ui/core' import Chat from '../components/chat' import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles' const useStyles = makeStyles({ send: { background: 'linear-gradient(45deg, #FE6B8B 30%, #FF8E53 90%)', border: 0, borderRadius: 3, boxShadow: '0 3px 5px 2px rgba(255, 105, 135, .3)', color: 'white', height: 48, padding: '0 30px', }, root: { width: '70%', height: '90vh', marginTop: '30px', margin: 'auto', overflow: 'hidden', scrollbarWidth: 1, }, chat: { backgroundColor: 'pink', height: '82vh', }, input: { height: '18vh', }, }) function HideAppBar() { return ( <> Scroll to Hide App Bar {[...new Array(12)] .map( () => `Cras mattis consectetur purus sit amet fermentum. Cras justo odio, dapibus ac facilisis in, egestas eget quam. Morbi leo risus, porta ac consectetur ac, vestibulum at eros. Praesent commodo cursus magna, vel scelerisque nisl consectetur et.` ) .join('\n')} ) } export default function Layout() { const classes = useStyles() return ( <>
) }
